trans-unit.source: Returns data from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar data från den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: An instance of SpeakProgressEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> event.
trans-unit.target: En instans av SpeakProgressEventArgs skapas när den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt aktiverar den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>genererar den här händelsen för varje ny ord som programmet använder en fråga med någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The returned data is based on the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) that the code generates.
trans-unit.target: Data som returnerades är baserad på tal sammanfattande Markup Language (SSML) som genereras av koden.

trans-unit.source: The values returned for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs.CharacterCount%2A> include spaces and the characters and contents of the SSML tags generated by the code.
trans-unit.target: De värden som returneras för <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs.CharacterCount%2A>innehålla blanksteg, tecken och innehållet i SSML-taggar som genererats av koden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs.CharacterCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio position of the event.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ljud positionen för händelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> normalizes numbers to the words that correspond to how the number will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>normaliserar siffror med orden som motsvarar hur numret uttalas.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, the synthesizer speaks the number “4003” as “four thousand three”.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel talar synthesizern nummer "4003" som "fyra tusen tre".

trans-unit.source: It raises a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> event for each of the spoken words, and returns the AudioPosition for each word.
trans-unit.target: Den genererar en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>händelse för varje tal och returnerar AudioPosition för varje ord.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the event in the audio output stream.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar positionen för händelsen i ljud utdataströmmen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters in the word that was spoken just before the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar antalet tecken i word som har talas precis innan händelsen skapades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> normalizes numbers to the words that correspond to how the number will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>normaliserar siffror med orden som motsvarar hur numret uttalas.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, the synthesizer speaks the number “4003” as “four thousand three”.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel talar synthesizern nummer "4003" som "fyra tusen tre".

trans-unit.source: It raises a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> event for each of the spoken words.
trans-unit.target: Den genererar en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>händelse för varje orden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: However, the CharacterCount property for each of the three words is the same.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CharacterCount för var och en av de tre ord är densamma.

trans-unit.source: It is the count of the characters in the number “4003” in the text of the prompt, in this case, four.
trans-unit.target: Är det antal tecken i antalet "4003" i texten i prompten i det här fallet fyra.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters in the word that was spoken just before the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar antalet tecken i word som har talas precis innan händelsen skapades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters and spaces from the beginning of the prompt to the position before the first letter of the word that was just spoken.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar antalet tecken och blanksteg från början av frågan till positionen före den första bokstaven för det ord som precis har talas.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters and spaces from the beginning of the prompt to the position before the first letter of the word that was just spoken.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar antalet tecken och blanksteg från början av frågan till positionen före den första bokstaven för det ord som precis har talas.

trans-unit.source: The text that was just spoken when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Den text som precis har talas om händelsen skapades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> normalizes numbers to the words that correspond to how the number will be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>normaliserar siffror med orden som motsvarar hur numret uttalas.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, the synthesizer speaks the number “4003” as “four thousand three”.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel talar synthesizern nummer "4003" som "fyra tusen tre".

trans-unit.source: It raises a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> event for each of the spoken words.
trans-unit.target: Den genererar en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>händelse för varje orden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: However, the Text property for each of the three words is the same.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Text för var och en av de tre ord är densamma.

trans-unit.source: It is the text “4003” from the prompt.
trans-unit.target: Det är texten "4003" från Kommandotolken.

trans-unit.source: Returns the text that was just spoken when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar texten som precis har talas om händelsen skapades.
